page.title: 08DARNICK TOWERS
page.content: {Darnick Towers}was built in 1425 by the ancestor of{Miss Heiton}who is the owner of the tower.It was built because the English army was fighting with the Scottish.The tower has a watch tower were men stood in case the enemy attacked.On the south wall there is a family emblem which is a {Chillingham Bull.}They are white and there are only about two herds of them in the world.The tower has four floors.Years ago the bottom floor had cattle,then there came the living room and the kitchen. Above that there were women's quarters and above that the men's quarters.At the back of the tower there is a well which is in the middle of the beautiful garden. The garden is kept very tidy by a local gardener.
